title: gubernatorial candidate in Georgia is flopping

sentence: "Going against a well-liked governor in Brian Kemp, who has by all objective accounts done a great job for Georgia, it strikes people as odd," said Barr.
author: Haisten Willis
title: The devolution of David Perdue

sentence: Alec Poitevint, who served as campaign chairman for every statewide Perdue race in Georgia -- yes, Sonny and David -- threw his weight and fundraising clout behind Brian Kemp.
author: Erick Erickson
title: The Worst-Played Hand in Politics Today
